page.title: 15HOLME LACY -PEOPLE'S LIVES 1
page.content: We carried out a{door to door survey in the village, and most people were {very helpful}with their answers. Some were{suspicious of being questioned, but didn't mind if their names weren't mentioned, and some were{quite happy when we said it was{for the BBC. }At some houses we were invited in and given{drinks and biscuits. }It was interesting how{very different people were, even in such a small village. People have lived here for between 3 weeks and all their lives, but the average was{9 years. }Most of them had{moved}here{from Hereford. }They mostly like the village because it is {quiet and peaceful,}it's near Hereford, they are{near their work}and their friends, and they{like the {people}in the village, though one old lady hinted that it was not all as nice as it seemed. We didn't like her.
